comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Think it's dark lace over a pale underfabric--you can see where the lace comes away from the dress at the bottom left. It probably looked different in person. Margaret Owen (1866-1941), first wife of British prime minister David Lloyd George: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Lloyd_George
